channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Virtual GPU Software and NVIDIA Cloud Gaming
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Virtual GPU Software and NVIDIA Cloud Gaming

item.title: CVE-2022-21816|2024-08-03T02:53:36.276Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20virtual%20gpu%20software%20and%20nvidia%20cloud%20gaming
item.description: NVIDIA vGPU software contains a vulnerability in the Virtual GPU Manager (nvidia.ko), where a user in the guest OS can cause a GPU interrupt storm on the hypervisor host, leading to a denial of service.
